TechStack.title: The Wisedrive Tech Stack: How We Validate Assets
TechStack.subheading: Beyond simple visual checks. We use proprietary technology to uncover the mechanical and financial reality of every asset.

dropdowns.title: Deep ECU & OBD-II Diagnostics
dropdowns.description: We don't just listen to the engine; we interrogate the onboard computer. Our scanners analyze live data streams for hidden fault codes, transmission slippage, and historical error logs that standard visual inspections miss.

dropdowns.title: Scientific Bodywork Analysis (Paint Microns)
dropdowns.description: Using digital coating thickness gauges, we map the paint depth across 15+ panels. Inconsistencies reveal previous accidents, bondo repairs, and resprays that are invisible to the naked eye.

dropdowns.title: 150-Point AI-Augmented Protocol
dropdowns.description: Our inspectors follow a rigid, app-guided workflow that prevents human subjectivity. Every checkpoint requires photographic evidence and data input, creating a standardized "Wisedrive Score" that allows you to compare asset quality across branches or regions instantly.

dropdowns.title: Algorithmic Fraud Detection
dropdowns.description: We cross-reference current vehicle condition against historical mileage databases and service records. Our system flags odometer rollbacks and VIN tampering immediately, preventing you from financing or insuring a phantom value.

Infrastructure.heading: Infrastructure for the Automotive Ecosystem
Infrastructure.description: Secure your assets and streamline operations with data infrastructure tailored to your sector.

card_1.title: Banks & Financiers
card_1.description: Secure your Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratios with hard technical data. We verify the true mileage and mechanical condition of collateral before approval. By detecting potential mechanical failures early, we reduce the risk of assets becoming Non-Performing Loans (NPLs) due to sudden depreciation or abandonment by the borrower.

card_2.title: Insurance Companies
card_2.description: Create a digital timestamp for asset condition. Our pre-inception audit documents every scratch, dent, and glass chip before policy issuance. This establishes an indisputable baseline that automatically filters out pre-existing damage claims and significantly lowers your loss ratio on used vehicle policies.

card_3.title: Dealership Networks & OEMs
card_3.description: We act as your technical firewall. Our detailed mechanical reports expose hidden accident history and engine faults before you trade in. For OEMs, our "Wisedrive Certified" protocol provides the standardization required to launch and scale a Certified Pre-Owned (CPO) program across a fragmented dealer network.

card_4.title: Marketplaces & Platforms
card_4.description: We bridge the trust gap in remote transactions. By acting as a neutral, third-party validator with standardized digital reports, we enable high-value transactions to occur entirely online. This increases Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) by giving remote buyers the technical confidence to purchase without a physical viewing.

FAQSection.heading: Got Questions about our inspection?
FAQSection.subtitle: Find answers to your questions about our inspections and warranty services.

q1.question: What services does Wisedrive offer for used car inspections?
q1.answer: Wisedrive offers comprehensive used car inspections covering critical components such as the engine, transmission, brakes, and electrical systems.

q2.question: How can I book an appointment for car inspections?
q2.answer: You can book an inspection through our website or mobile app by selecting your preferred package and scheduling an appointment.

q3.question: What is included in a Wisedrive used car inspection?
q3.answer: Our inspections cover over 200 checkpoints, including mechanical, electrical, and safety systems.

q4.question: How does the inspection process work?
q4.answer: A certified technician will inspect your car at your location or a partner garage, providing a detailed report afterward.

q5.question: How long does a typical car inspection take?
q5.answer: An inspection usually takes about 1-2 hours, depending on the vehicle's condition and the package chosen.

q6.question: Can I request an inspection for any type of vehicle?
q6.answer: We inspect most types of vehicles, including sedans, SUVs, and trucks.

q7.question: What is the cost of a used car inspection?
q7.answer: The cost varies based on the package selected. Detailed pricing is available on our website.

q8.question: What types of warranties does Wisedrive offer?
q8.answer: We offer various warranty plans that cover different aspects of vehicle maintenance and repairs.

q9.question: How do I purchase a warranty with my inspection?
q9.answer: You can add a warranty to your inspection package during the booking process on our website or app.

q10.question: What does the Wisedrive warranty cover?
q10.answer: Coverage varies by plan but generally includes major components such as the engine, transmission, and electrical systems.

q11.question: Are there any exclusions in the warranty coverage?
q11.answer: Yes, some exclusions apply. Please refer to the specific warranty terms and conditions for details.

q12.question: How do I claim warranty repairs with Wisedrive?
q12.answer: Contact our support team to file a claim, and we will guide you through the process and direct you to an authorised service centre.

q13.question: Can I transfer my warranty to a new owner if I sell my car?
q13.answer: Yes, warranties can be transferred to new owners, ensuring continued coverage.

q14.question: What is the validity period of your warranties?
q14.answer: Warranty periods vary by package and can range from 6 months to several years.

general_scope.point_4: The Vehicle should be in a clean condition to ensure the Inspector can accurately see and report on the vehicle parts being inspected. road_test.point_7: Our Inspector requires sufficient space to walk around the Vehicle and fully open all doors. Our Inspector also needs to have sufficient space to park his/her vehicle near the Inspection location.
road_test.point_8: High-quality indoor lighting or sufficient sunlight (if the Inspection is performed outdoors) must be provided at the Inspection location. We cannot inspect the Vehicle in poor lighting or in dark conditions.

payment_cancellation.point_5: You are entitled to cancel the Inspection and receive a full refund of the Payment if the cancellation is made at least 24 hours before the scheduled Inspection. After the Inspection has been carried out, no refund of the payment will be given.

payment_cancellation.point_7: To enable us to locate your booking, you need to provide your name, address, telephone number, and booking reference number (as given in your booking confirmation) along with your cancellation request.

complaints.point_2: No repairs should be undertaken or any parts of the vehicle replaced before a re-inspection is carried out by Us. what_we_do.section_title: What We Do With Your Information
what_we_do.content: When you purchase from our store, as part of the buying and selling process, we collect personal information you provide to us such as your name, address and email address. When you browse our store, we also automatically receive your computer's Internet Protocol (IP) address to provide us information that helps us understand your browser and operating system. Email marketing (if applicable): With your permission, we may send you emails about our store, new products and other updates.

consent.how_consent: How do you give us your consent? When you provide personal information to us to complete a transaction, verify your credit card, place an order, arrange delivery or return a purchase, we consider that you consent for us to collect and use it only for that specific purpose. If we ask for your personal information for a secondary purpose, such as marketing, we will ask for your permission directly or give you an opportunity to refuse. How can I withdraw my consent? If after you consent, you change your mind, you can withdraw your consent for us to contact you, to continue collecting, using or disclosing your information at any time by contacting us at support.my@wisedrive.com.

disclosure.content: We may disclose your personal information if we are required to do so by law or if you breach our Terms of Service.

payment.content: We use Razorpay to process payments. We/Razorpay do not store your card data on their servers. This data is encrypted through Payment Card Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS) during payment processing. Your purchase transaction data is only used as long as needed to complete your purchase transaction. After that, your purchase transaction information is not stored. Our payment gateway complies with the standards set by PCI-DSS managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands such as Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover. PCI-DSS requirements help ensure the secure handling of credit card information by our store and its service providers. For more information, you can also read Razorpay's terms and conditions.

third_party.content: Generally, third-party providers used by us will only collect, use and disclose your information to the extent necessary to enable them to perform the services they provide to us. However, certain third-party service providers, such as payment gateways and other payment transaction processors, have their own privacy policies regarding the information we must provide to them for your purchase transaction. For these providers, we recommend you read their privacy policies so you understand how your personal information will be handled by these providers. In particular, it should be noted that certain providers may be located in or have facilities located in a jurisdiction different from you or us. So, if you choose to proceed with a transaction involving the services of a third-party provider, then your information may be subject to the laws of the jurisdiction where the service provider or its facility is located. Once you leave our store website or are redirected to a third-party website or application, you are no longer subject to this Privacy Policy or our website's Terms of Service. When you click a link on our store, that link may take you outside our website. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of other websites and encourage you to read their privacy statements.

security.content: To protect your personal information, we take reasonable precautionary steps and follow industry best practices to ensure that the information is not lost, misused, accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed improperly.

cookies.content: We use cookies to maintain your user session. It is not used to identify you personally on other websites.

age_consent.content: By using this site, you affirm that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site.

changes.content: We have the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please review it frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting to the website. If we make material changes to this policy, we will notify you here that it has been updated, so you are aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we use and/or disclose it. If our store is acquired or merged with another company, your information may be transferred to the new owner so we can continue to sell products to you.

contact.content: If you would like to: access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you, make a complaint, or simply want more information, please contact our Privacy Compliance Officer at support.my@wisedrive.com.
